name: Felted Wool Nursery Mobile
description:
Four inquisitive creatures peer at one another as they hang from strong monofilament to give the effect of floating in constant motion. Each are felted to solid firmness with soft Merino wool, and they are approx 3 inches high. The overall dimension of the mobile is 11x11 inches.

In contemporary colours of turquoise, purple, salmon pink and yellow, these little creatures will have your baby transfixed.

I make these to order so expect UK delivery of your mobile within 7 working days. International orders take longer.

This mobile is not a toy. Take care to hang out of reach of small mischievous hands!

name: Felted Wool Raincloud Mobile
description:
This mobile would look just as lovely in a grown-up room as well as a kids room. The carefully sculpted cloud and each of its raindrops are hand felted from soft Merino wool using a single barbed needle. It is a time consuming process, but the outcome is worth it.

The cloud hangs from strong monofilament, as do the raindrops, giving the illusion from afar that it floats as it spins gently in the slightest breeze.

Each mobile is made to order so please expect up to two weeks for delivery. If you would like the raindrops in your own choice of colours, just contact me and I will be happy to oblige.

Please take care to hang mobiles out of reach of small and mischievous hands.

name: Tweet Tweet Mobile
description:
Sweet little birds in shades of teal, yellow and pink perch upon reclaimed branches collected from Highgate Wood in London. Each bird is handmade from 100% cotton fabrics carefully selected in contrasting yet complimentary colours and patterns. Their bodies are stuffed with poly-fill and they are secured to the branches with wire for their feet and invisible thread. 

The mobile is suspended with extremely strong monofilament to give it the illusion of floating. The branches spin gently in the lightest breeze; your little one will be transfixed! This is a mobile which will grow with your child, adding whimsical charm to any room.

Each mobile is made to order so please expect up to two weeks for delivery. Overseas orders take a little longer. If you require less or more birds, or want them in different colours, please contact me for a quote and I will be more than happy to work with you in creating a mobile which perfectly compliments your nursery. 

Please take care to hang mobiles out of reach of small and mischievous hands.
